welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Palm River-Clair Mel, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in all that this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mac Dill AFB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Mac Dill AFB Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tampa International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside A
terminals.description: Airside A is one of four airside terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving various airlines.

terminals.name: Airside C
terminals.description: Airside C is one of four airside terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving various airlines.

terminals.name: Airside E
terminals.description: Airside E is one of four airside terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving various airlines.

terminals.name: Airside F
terminals.description: Airside F is one of four airside terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving various airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whitted Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Whitted Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering luxurious facilities for discerning travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Petersburg-Clearwater International Airport houses all of the airport's services and amenities, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and dining options.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at St. Petersburg-Clearwater International Airport serves as the primary hub for domestic flights, with gates for major airlines such as Delta and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at St. Petersburg-Clearwater International Airport serves as the hub for international flights, with gates for airlines such as Air Canada and British Airways.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge. Simply connect to the 'PIE Airport WiFi' network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, offering a comfortable and efficient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Executive Airport handles all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Executive Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering luxurious amenities for discerning travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
